Item was not the same quality shown in the picture.  It's basically showing you a hoodie that would cost $50 at hot topic back in the day but they are sending you a $10 hoodie from (wish) made of thin inferior material.  If you're looking to spend $30ish dollars on a hoodie only worth about $10 then this product is for you. Otherwise if you're looking for a carhartt quality hoodie then spend the extra $20 and buy a carhartt. You'll find better quality and value for the same price at your local clothing retailer.
